resources.string: For quick differentiation between hotels and cabins, now everyone has a different icon.
The hotels have a green icon.
The cabins have a color orange icon.
To see the route you need the Google Maps App
Please select the location of the local
You have an outdated version of the App. \n\n To use app you must upgrade.

Tap to select the desired location, then press the button to select address. \n\n Not worry if the item is not on the exact location, it is an approximation of address, our team will be verifying the accuracy of the data.

You can collaborate with the application, suggesting new places that you know that they are not included in the app. \n\n All data provided are sent anonymously and will be evaluated by our team for possible publication.

Through this option you can see the availability of this local, you can see if it is full, half or empty.

You can also collaborate reporting availability, if you are near this place, press the report button,so you can share information with other users.

The availability is calculated based on reports of the users, while more reports have and less time, more reliable the data will be. Only locals who are subscribed to the service availability online can provide fully reliable information, others can only provide estimates based on reports from users.
To report you must be at a distance not exceeding the range of a Wi-Fi wireless network, specifically 100 meters.
This number indicates the number of users who have voted, the greater the amount will be more reliable information.
This indicates the time that has elapsed since the last vote was held. \n\nThe less time will be the most reliable the information.

You can contribute by reporting the availability of this place.\n\nPressing the button you are indicating that this place is FULL!!, you can only report if you are at a close distance of local! (like the range of a wireless network). All data supplied are sent anonymously.

You can contribute by reporting the availability of this place.\n\nPressing the button you are indicating that this place is MEDIUM!!, you can only report if you are at a close distance of local! (like the range of a wireless network). All data supplied are sent anonymously.

You can contribute by reporting the availability of this place.\n\nPressing the button you are indicating that this place is EMPTY!!, you can only report if you are at a close distance of local! (like the range of a wireless network). All data supplied are sent anonymously.
Thanks for being part of the community of collaborators, your help is welcome!. \n\n All data provided are sent anonymously and will be evaluated by our team for possible publication.
The location service is disabled, it\'s need to show you nearby Places.\n\nPlease enable the location service.

You can suggest a service that you know that this place offers, each service has a name, type, and price eg name: Room Classic, type: Bed and price: $ 800. \n \n All data provided are sent anonymously and will be evaluated by our team for possible publication.
You can contribute suggesting a phone number that you know of this place. \n\n All data provided are sent anonymously and will be reviewed by our staff, for possible publication.

You can contribute suggesting credit cards that are accepted at this place, eg they only accept Visa and MasterCard. \n\n All data provided are sent anonymously and will be reviewed by our staff, for possible publication.

You can contribute suggesting images of this place, such as a photo of the inside or outside of a room \n\n All data provided are sent anonymously and will be reviewed by our staff, for possible publication.
You can contribute suggesting a location of this place,eg it near Independence Avenue \n\n All data provided are sent anonymously and will be reviewed by our staff, for possible publication.
Suggests a cabin, hotel or motel.
Find the nearest Hotel to you
Debes seleccionar al menos una opción!
Locate both cottages and hotels in the Dominican Republic, obtaining information like prices, images, possible routes of arrival and ratings.
Connect your device to an internet network to get all data
The image can not be loaded
You can contribute suggesting menu items that are offered at this location, eg food or drinks. \n\n All supplied data is sent anonymously and will be reviewed by our staff, for possible publication.
Por favor cada vez que vayas a un local no registrado, pregúntales por que no están registrados en Cabañas RD.
Contamos con tu ayuda.\n Para más información www.cabanasrd.com.do 809-607-6736
